name: SurVibe!
description:
In this game, you control Someone Else, who has entered this mysterious death maze under circumstances that aren't actually important (or known). Try to escape the horrifying labyrinth as your speed increases over time. The faster you go, the more perilous the journey! Hit a wall, get hurt. Attacked by enemy, get hurt. 

Can you adapt? Can you overcome the increasingly hard challenges? Can you...

SURVIBE?
